author: Micky-kun
install_msg:
⏲️ **Timeouts for Red V3**
Thanks for installing. This should help out for a while until Red officially supports Timeouts. Since the permissions for this to work are not present in discord.py, make sure you set the mod role for your server, or use the permissions cog to provide access. Also, once Red fully supports Timeouts, this cog will be deprecated in favor of that. Anyway, enjoy the cog!
